rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Lobby
rooms.description: A spacious entrance with built-in storage and a small reception area, adhering to Vastu principles for inviting energy.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area featuring traditional Chettinad-style furnishings with intricate carved pillars. Open view to the courtyard garden in keeping with natural light and air flow guidelines.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Connected to the kitchen, designed for family meals. The layout ensures a clear line of sight from the entrance as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern yet traditional design with open plan elements; includes storage and ventilation systems that align with local building codes.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Located in the north-east to harness auspicious energy, complete with an attached ensuite bathroom ensuring privacy.

rooms.name: Guest Room 2
rooms.description: Situates on the west side for balanced energy flow, includes a small balcony for fresh air as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Child's Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Designated for children in the south-east quadrant to support growth and learning; built-in study area included.

rooms.name: Guest Room 4
rooms.description: Additional guest bedroom located on the east side, aligning with auspicious directions.

rooms.name: Utility/Service Area
rooms.description: Includes laundry, storage and service access; positioned away from primary living areas per local norms.

rooms.name: Additional Bedrooms
rooms.description: Two extra bedrooms designed to offer privacy and additional space, following Chettinad aesthetic with intricate detailing.

rooms.name: Ensuite Bathroom for Bedroom 5
rooms.description: Fully equipped bathroom ensuring comfort and adherence to local norms.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: Multi-functional space with built-in shelves and adequate ventilation, ideally placed in the north-west corner as per Vastu.

levels.description: A spacious rooftop terrace offering panoramic views, designed with a blend of traditional Chettinad decorative elements and modern amenities. Features include an outdoor seating area, water feature, and lush landscaping.
